name: Night of the Limping Dead
description:
Assemble yourself before your friends.

Prototype developed in 48 hours for #asylumjam

Requires two gamepads (Xbox 360 and One tested) to play or re-mapping of unity inputs.

"Dance of Deception" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
